entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Split/remove new ItemsSource interfaces #4457
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Maybe change return of IGroupableItemsViewSource.GetGroupAndIndex to record #4456
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • controls like "chips" should be part of standard library #4452
  • Renaming all things Native --> Platform #4451
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #4450
  • Visual Studio 2022 Preview Version 17.1.0 Preview 4.0 Create new project does not scaffold all of the dependencies correctly #4449
  • [WinUI, Shell] Convert bottom tabs on WinUI Shell to using HierarchicalNavigationItems #4448
  • Add IHotReloadableView to all relevant parts of Controls #4445
  • corner radius for entry control should be part of standard library #4442
  • [Blazor webview] Exception handling for blazor webview #4441
  • Attached debugger doesn't stop on startup exceptions #4440

Closed

  • Fix how our ViewHandler exposes out INativeViewHandler.NativeView and cleanup GetWrappedNativeView #4366
  • Blazor startup errors for duplicate routes is hard to discover and debug #3695
  • MAUI Projects do not show platform specific .cs C# code files except for the first TFM in the TargetFrameworks list #4410
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Shell pages cannot work with DI #3147
    .NET 7
  • Cannot change Android SDK version from 31 to a lower one. #4404
  • [WinUI] Finish filling in all the styling mappers on WinUI TabbedPageHandler #4260
  • [Shell] Application crashes Page constructor arg cannot resolve type from service provider (wrong constructor used) #4318
  • Shell page dependency resolution optimization #4280

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
  • Ensure that using the AndExpand Grid hack doesn't null out BindingContext #4455
  • Add provisionator to windows #4453
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement EvaluateJavaScriptAsync method in WebView #4435
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • [loc]Add Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks reference #4439
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix INativeViewHandler to return more expected NativeView #4432
  • Remove ambiguity in updates in WinUI #4454
  • Add an item group for all the platform folders #4430
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Backport preview 13 fixes #4434
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4433
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix coherent dependency #4436
  • [WinUI] Wire up the rest of the TabbedPage properties #4429
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281
    area/shell 🐢
  • Make sure all @(Compile) items appear in the Solution Explorer #4411
    6.0.200-preview.13

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟
